name: paho-mqttd
description: The Eclipse Paho MQTT D Client for Posix and Windows

configurations.name: paho-mqttd-posix
preBuildCommands: if [ -d lib ]; then cd lib ; rm -f libpaho-mqttd.so libpaho-mqttd.so.0 ; fi
if [ -e lib/libpaho-mqttd.so.0.1 ]; then cd lib ; mv libpaho-mqttd.so.0.1 libpaho-mqttd.so; fi

subPackages.name: async_pub
subPackages.description: Simple Paho MQTT example for message publishing

subPackages.name: async_sub
subPackages.description: Simple Paho MQTT example for message subscription

subPackages.name: thr_sub
subPackages.description: Simple Paho MQTT example for threaded message subscription
